languages.text:
Chorda gains a <u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% chance to ignore any enemy {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. This chance is doubled against attacks or abilities of daemons and {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}.
Additionally, Chorda uses Willpower instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} for determining her {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} and for {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} abilities.
languages.original_text:
С шансом <u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}ВОЛ{/g})</u>% Чорда может игнорировать любой получаемый {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} или действие {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} противника. Этот шанс удваивается против атак и способностей демонов, а также против {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}психосил{/g}.
Также Чорда использует Волю вместо {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительности{/g} для расчета {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимости{/g} и действия способностей мастера-{g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}тактика{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Chorda gains a <u>(2 × WP bonus)</u>% chance to ignore any enemy damage or ability. This chance is doubled against attacks or abilities of daemons and psychic powers.
Additionally, Chorda uses WP instead of FEL for determining her resolve and for Tactician abilities.

Chorda gains a <u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% chance to ignore any enemy {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. This chance is doubled against attacks or abilities of daemons and {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}.
Additionally, Chorda uses Willpower instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} for determining her {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} and for {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} abilities.

languages.text:
Chorda gana una probabilidad del <u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}VOL{/g})</u> % de ignorar cualquier {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} del enemigo. La probabilidad se duplica contra ataques y capacidades de daemons y contra {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}poderes psíquicos{/g}.
Además, Chorda usa su Voluntad en vez de su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g} al determinar su {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g} y para las capacidades de {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}maestro táctico{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Chorda gains a <u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% chance to ignore any enemy {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. This chance is doubled against attacks or abilities of daemons and {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}.
Additionally, Chorda uses Willpower instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} for determining her {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} and for {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} abilities.

traits.locale_text:
Chorda gana una probabilidad del <u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}VOL{/g})</u> % de ignorar cualquier daño o {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} del enemigo. La probabilidad se duplica contra ataques y capacidades de daemons y contra {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}poderes psíquicos{/g}.
Además, Chorda usa su VOL en vez de su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}EMP{/g} al determinar su {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g} y para las capacidades de táctico.

languages.text:
库尔达有<u>（2×{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）</u>%的几率，无视敌方造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}效果。当受到恶魔与{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能{/g}攻击或能力影响时，触发几率翻倍。
此外，库尔达的{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}战术专家{/g}能力效果取决于她的意志，而非{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}。
languages.original_text:
Chorda gains a <u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% chance to ignore any enemy {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. This chance is doubled against attacks or abilities of daemons and {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}.
Additionally, Chorda uses Willpower instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} for determining her {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} and for {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} abilities.

traits.locale_text:
库尔达有<u>（2×{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）</u>%的几率，无视敌方造成的伤害或{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}效果。当受到恶魔与{g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}灵能{/g}攻击或能力影响时，触发几率翻倍。
此外，库尔达的{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}与战术专家能力效果取决于她的意志，而非{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}。

languages.text:
Chorda a <u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}FM{/g})</u> % de chances d'ignorer les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} ou les {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} de l'ennemi. Ces chances sont doublées contre les attaques ou les capacités des démons et contre les {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoirs psychiques{/g}.
De plus, Chorda utilise la Force Mentale au détriment de la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sociabilité{/g} pour calculer sa {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}détermination{/g} et pour les capacités de {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}maître tacticien{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Chorda gains a <u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% chance to ignore any enemy {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. This chance is doubled against attacks or abilities of daemons and {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}.
Additionally, Chorda uses Willpower instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} for determining her {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} and for {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} abilities.

traits.locale_text:
Chorda a <u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}VOL{/g})</u> % de chances d'ignorer les dégâts ou les {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} de l'ennemi. Ces chances sont doublées contre les attaques ou les capacités des démons et contre les {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}pouvoirs psychiques{/g}.
De plus, Chorda utilise la VOL au détriment de la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FRA{/g} pour calculer sa {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}détermination{/g} et pour les capacités de Tacticien.

languages.text:
Chorda erlangt eine <u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WK{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g})</u> %ige Chance, jeglichen feindlichen {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} oder jede {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} zu ignorieren. Diese Chance wird gegen Angriffe oder Fähigkeiten von Dämonen und {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psionische Kräfte{/g} verdoppelt.
Darüber hinaus nutzt Chorda WK anstatt {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschaft{/g} für ihre {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Meistertaktiker{/g}-Fähigkeiten, und um ihre {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g} zu ermitteln.
languages.original_text:
Chorda gains a <u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% chance to ignore any enemy {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. This chance is doubled against attacks or abilities of daemons and {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}.
Additionally, Chorda uses Willpower instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} for determining her {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} and for {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} abilities.

traits.locale_text:
Chorda erlangt eine <u>(2× {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WK{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g})</u> %ige Chance, jeglichen feindlichen Schaden oder jede {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} zu ignorieren. Diese Chance wird gegen Angriffe oder Fähigkeiten von Dämonen und {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}psionische Kräfte{/g} verdoppelt.
Darüber hinaus nutzt Chorda WK anstatt {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}GEF{/g} für ihre taktischen Fähigkeiten, und um ihre{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g} zu ermitteln.

languages.text:
チョーダはいかなる敵の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}または{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}も無視する確率<u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g})</u>% を獲得する。この確率は、ディーモンのアビリティまたは{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}超能力{/g}による攻撃に対して2倍になる。
さらにチョーダは、{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}決断力{/g}の使用と{g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}戦略の達人{/g}アビリティに、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}連帯{/g}ではなく意志力を使用する。
languages.original_text:
Chorda gains a <u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% chance to ignore any enemy {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. This chance is doubled against attacks or abilities of daemons and {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}.
Additionally, Chorda uses Willpower instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} for determining her {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} and for {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} abilities.

traits.locale_text:
チョーダはいかなる敵のダメージまたは{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}も無視する確率<u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g})</u>% を獲得する。この確率は、ディーモンのアビリティまたは{g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}超能力{/g}による攻撃に対して2倍になる。
さらにチョーダは、{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}決断力{/g}の使用と戦略家のアビリティに、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g}ではなくWPを使用する。

languages.text:
С шансом <u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}ВОЛ{/g})</u>% Чорда может игнорировать любой получаемый {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} или действие {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} противника. Этот шанс удваивается против атак и способностей демонов, а также против {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}психосил{/g}.
Также Чорда использует Волю вместо {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительности{/g} для расчета {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимости{/g} и действия способностей мастера-{g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}тактика{/g}.

This chance is doubled against attacks or abilities of daemons and {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}.
Additionally, Chorda uses Willpower instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} for determining her {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} and for {g|Encyclopedia:CareerTacticianGlossary}Master Tactician{/g} abilities.

traits.locale_text:
С шансом <u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}ВОЛ{/g})</u>% Чорда может игнорировать любой получаемый урон или действие {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} противника. Этот шанс удваивается против атак и способностей демонов, а также против {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}психосил{/g}.
Также Чорда использует Волю вместо {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительности{/g} для расчета {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимости{/g} и действия способностей тактика.

С шансом <u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}ВОЛ{/g})</u>% Чорда может игнорировать любой получаемый урон или действие {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} противника. Этот шанс удваивается против атак и способностей демонов, а также против {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}психосил{/g}.
Также Чорда использует Волю вместо {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительности{/g} для расчета {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимости{/g} и действия способностей тактика.
